fields.name: Demon Claws
fields.description: Activate the Demon Hunter’s Hero Power to gain 1 Attack this turn.

fields.name: Shapeshift
fields.description: Activate the Druid’s Hero Power to gain 1 armor and 1 attack this turn.

fields.name: Steady Shot
fields.description: Activate the Hunter’s Hero Power to deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.

fields.name: Fireblast
fields.description: Activate the Mage’s Hero Power to deal 1 damage to any target of your choosing.

fields.name: Reinforce
fields.description: Activate the Paladin’s Hero power to summon a 1/1 Silver Hand Recruit minion.

fields.name: Lesser Heal
fields.description: Activate the Priest’s Hero Power to restore 2 health to any target on the board.

fields.name: Dagger Mastery
fields.description: Activate the Rogue’s Hero Power to equip a weapon with 1 attack and 2 durability.

fields.name: Totemic Call
fields.description: Activating the Shaman’s Hero Power will randomly summon 1 of 4 possible Totem minions: Healing Totem, Stoneclaw Totem, Searing Totem, or Wrath of Air Totem.

fields.name: Life Tap
fields.description: Activate the Warlock’s Hero Power to draw a card and lose 2 health.

fields.name: Armor Up!
fields.description: Activating the Warrior’s Hero Power 'Armor Up!' grants 2 Armor, which functions as indefinitely stacking additional Health.
